attributes.action: Recover the taxpayer money spent on the Diana inquiry from Mohamed Al-Fayed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ensure that no more funds from the taxpayer be made available to the Diana inquiry, more than a decade after her death, and that the Government should take action to recover the £7 million pounds already spent on this inquiry from Mohamed Al-Fayed, whose paranoia was the prime instigator of this profligate and unnecessary inquiry.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
